homePage.hero_desc: We deliver outstanding solutions, ensuring your success across various industries.
homePage.about_preview_text: MV Group is dedicated to providing innovative solutions in construction, real estate, automotive, supply chain management, food & restaurant management, and jewelry sectors. We strive for excellence and customer satisfaction in every venture.
homePage.proven_expertise_desc: Years of experience delivering successful projects across diverse sectors.
homePage.client_centric_desc: We prioritize your needs, ensuring tailored solutions and transparent communication.
homePage.sustainable_growth_desc: Committed to innovative and sustainable practices for long-term success.
homePage.contact_cta_desc: Ready to take the next step? Our team is here to help you achieve your goals.

services_highlights.automotive_desc: Premium automotive solutions with performance and elegance.
services_highlights.food_restaurant_desc: Unique dining experiences with culinary innovation.

homePage.featured_projects_sample_desc: A brief description of the project highlighting its key features and success.

aboutPage.title: About <1>MV Group</1>
aboutPage.intro_text: MV Group is a dynamic company known for innovation, trust, and sustainable growth. We operate globally, providing high-quality solutions tailored to customer needs across diverse industries. Our commitment to excellence drives us to constantly seek new ways to deliver value and foster long-term partnerships.
aboutPage.vision_text: Achieving sustainable global leadership through innovation and excellence in every sector we operate.
aboutPage.mission_text: Delivering excellence in every project, exceeding client expectations, and fostering growth for our partners and communities.
aboutPage.journey_2010_desc: MV Group established with a vision for excellence in construction.
aboutPage.journey_2015_desc: Expanded operations into real estate and automotive sectors.
aboutPage.journey_2020_desc: Entered supply chain, food, and jewelry markets, achieving significant growth.
aboutPage.journey_present_desc: Operating globally with a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction.
aboutPage.team_member_ceo_bio: Visionary leader with 20+ years of experience driving innovation.
aboutPage.team_member_coo_bio: Expert in operational excellence and strategic planning.
aboutPage.team_member_cto_bio: Passionate about leveraging technology for business growth.

servicesPage.title: Our Comprehensive <1>Services</1>
servicesPage.intro_text: Discover how MV Group's diverse expertise can empower your vision and drive success across multiple industries.
servicesPage.construction_desc: From planning to completion, we create contemporary, elegant, and highly functional spaces tailored to your vision. Our expertise covers residential, commercial, and industrial projects, ensuring quality and sustainability.
servicesPage.automotive_desc: Combining performance with elegance, we offer premium automotive solutions suited to your style. From luxury vehicles to specialized transport, we provide sales, servicing, and custom modifications.
servicesPage.supply_chain_desc: Efficient, secure, and strategic logistics solutions ensuring the highest standards of service and profitability. We optimize your supply chain from end-to-end, leveraging technology and global networks.
servicesPage.food_restaurant_desc: We blend traditional tastes with modern culinary innovation, delivering unique dining experiences. Our portfolio includes fine dining, casual eateries, and catering services, all focused on quality and hospitality.
servicesPage.jewelry_desc: Our jewelry combines exquisite craftsmanship with timeless elegance, representing sophistication and quality. We offer a curated selection of fine jewelry, bespoke designs, and expert consultation.

projectsPage.title: Our <1>Projects</1>
projectsPage.intro_text: Explore a selection of our successfully completed projects that showcase our commitment to quality, innovation, and client satisfaction across various sectors.
projectsPage.no_projects_found: No projects found matching your criteria. Try adjusting your search or filter.

projectDetailPage.project_not_found_desc: The project you are looking for does not exist or may have been moved.
projectDetailPage.feedback_text: "MV Group delivered exceptional results, exceeding our expectations in quality and timeliness. Their professionalism was outstanding."

blogPage.title: Our <1>Blog</1>
blogPage.intro_text: Stay informed with the latest insights, news, and articles from MV Group and industry experts.
blogPage.no_posts_found: No blog posts available at the moment. Check back soon!
blogPage.detail_page_note: Note: Clicking "Read More" will currently not lead to a detailed blog post page as it's a placeholder. This functionality can be added.

contactPage.title: Get In <1>Touch</1>
contactPage.intro_text: We're here to answer any questions you may have. Reach out to us and we'll respond as soon as we can.
contactPage.map_note: Note: Map shows a placeholder location in Istanbul. Replace with actual coordinates.
contactPage.toast_desc_success: Thank you, {{name}}! We've received your message and will get back to you soon at {{email}}.

notFoundPage.subtitle: Page Not Found
notFoundPage.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't seem to exist. It might have been moved or deleted.

projectData.azure_towers_desc: A landmark residential project featuring state-of-the-art amenities and sustainable design.
projectData.azure_towers_detail_desc: A landmark residential project featuring state-of-the-art amenities and sustainable design. This project involved complex architectural planning and execution, resulting in an iconic addition to the city skyline. It includes over 500 luxury apartments, retail spaces, and extensive green areas.
projectData.velocity_hub_desc: A premier destination for luxury and performance vehicles, offering sales and advanced servicing.
projectData.velocity_hub_detail_desc: A premier destination for luxury and performance vehicles, offering sales and advanced servicing. The hub features a state-of-the-art showroom, multiple service bays, and a customer lounge.
projectData.logistics_center_desc: A technologically advanced hub streamlining global supply chains with efficiency and precision.
projectData.gourmet_table_desc: An award-winning restaurant offering innovative cuisine and an exceptional dining experience.
projectData.elysian_jewels_desc: A stunning collection of handcrafted jewelry, showcasing timeless elegance and master craftsmanship.
projectData.greentech_office_desc: An eco-friendly office park designed for productivity and well-being, featuring sustainable technologies.
projectData.artisan_bakery_desc: A popular chain of bakeries known for high-quality, handcrafted breads and pastries.
projectData.precision_parts_desc: A cutting-edge facility producing high-precision automotive components for leading manufacturers.
